title: Report online terrorist and extremist material

details.description: Report extremism, terrorism or extremist content on the internet - your report will be treated anonymously
details.more_information:
Examples of illegal material include:

  • speeches or essays calling for racial or religious violence
  • videos of terrorism or racial or religious violence with messages of ‘glorification’ or praise for the attackers
  • chat forums with postings calling for people to commit acts of terrorism or violent extremism
  • messages intended to stir up hatred against any religious or ethnic group
details.introduction: Report illegal terrorist or violent extremist information, pictures or videos on the internet. Your report will be treated anonymously.
details.alternate_methods:
Report extremist content online by finding out which company hosts the website and telling them.

You can contact your local police if you’re concerned about extremism in your area.
